# FrugalScan

> FrugalScan is a privacy-first personal finance web application that analyzes bank statement PDFs using AI to provide spending insights without requiring users to link their bank accounts.

## What FrugalScan Does

FrugalScan helps people understand where their money goes by:
- Parsing bank statement PDFs with 99.7% accuracy using AI
- Automatically categorizing transactions into spending categories
- Detecting recurring subscriptions
- Generating personalized insights and savings recommendations
- Displaying clear charts showing spending by category and top merchants

## Key Differentiators

- **Privacy-First**: No bank account linking required. Your statement is processed and immediately discarded.
- **No Account Required**: Upload and analyze without creating an account.
- **AI-Powered Accuracy**: Uses Claude AI to understand context, not brittle regex patterns.
- **60-Second Results**: Full analysis in about one minute.

## How It Works

1. User uploads a bank or credit card statement PDF
2. AI extracts and validates all transactions
3. Transactions are categorized using 200+ merchant keywords
4. Subscriptions are detected from a whitelist of known services
5. AI generates personalized insights and savings tips
6. Results displayed with interactive charts

## Pages

- [Home](https://www.frugalscan.com/): Upload your statement and start analysis
- [Results](https://www.frugalscan.com/results): View spending breakdown, insights, and recommendations

## Technical Details

- Built with Next.js 14 and TypeScript
- Uses Claude API for PDF parsing and insights generation
- Recharts for data visualization
- Hosted on Vercel

## Target Users

People who want to understand their spending but:
- Don't want to link their bank accounts to apps like Mint or YNAB
- Find traditional budgeting apps overwhelming
- Want a quick, one-time analysis rather than ongoing tracking
